mapper.insert: insert into t_video (id, `name`, nameEng, showTime, scenario, videoTime, videoCoverId, isDelete, isUpdate, clickNumber, isGetCopyright, addTime,updateTime, addBy) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{nameEng}, #{showTime}, #{scenario}, #{videoTime}, #{videoCoverId}, 0, 0, #{clickNumber}, 0, #{addTime},#{updateTime}, #{addBy})
mapper.select: select count(videoId) as number, t_video.* from t_click INNER JOIN t_video on t_video.id = t_click.videoId where t_video.isDelete = 0 GROUP BY videoId ORDER BY number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
